title: Add accessibility improvements for screen readers
description:
**Problem:** No accessibility considerations in the TUI implementation.

**Solution:** 
- Add ARIA-like descriptions for screen readers
- Ensure sufficient color contrast
- Consider adding audio feedback for key actions

title: Show elapsed time during Gemini API calls
Fix race condition in iterative scan goroutines
description:
**File:** `internal/ui/wizard.go`, lines 900-967

**Problem:** The `iterativeScanCmd` accesses `m.scanState` fields from both the main goroutine and spawned goroutine without synchronization, causing potential race conditions.

**Solution:** Use channels properly or switch to `tea.Batch` with separate progress polling.

title: Convert state-mutating setters to use messages
description:
**File:** `internal/ui/screens/review.go`, lines 379-405

**Problem:** Setter methods like `SetGenerated()`, `SetXxx()` mutate state outside the Update function, breaking the MVU pattern.

**Solution:** Convert setters to return new model or use messages. State should only change in response to messages within Update.

title: Remove unused code in progress component
description:
**File:** `internal/ui/components/progress.go`

**Unused methods:**
- `UpdateFromScanner()` (line 58)
- `UpdateFromGenerator()` (line 62)
- `GetSpinnerTickCmd()` (line 276)

**File:** `internal/ui/wizard.go`
- `writeFile()` (line 852) - actual file writing happens in `saveGeneratedContent()`

**Solution:** Delete these unused methods to reduce code maintenance burden.

title: Add confirmation dialogs for destructive actions
description:
**Problem:** No confirmation when:
- Pressing Ctrl+Q to quit mid-wizard
- Overwriting an existing generated file
- Navigating back (losing progress in current step)

**Solution:** Add confirmation modal for these destructive actions.

title: Replace magic layout numbers with named constants
description:
**Files:**
- `internal/ui/screens/file_selection.go`, line 44: `height-6`
- `internal/ui/screens/task_input.go`, lines 59-60: `height-10`, `width-6`

**Problem:** Hard-coded magic numbers for layout calculations make maintenance difficult.

**Solution:** Create named constants:
```go
const (
    headerHeight = 6
    footerHeight = 4
    horizontalPadding = 6
)
```

title: Standardize Update method signatures across screens
description:
**Problem:** Screen sub-models have inconsistent `Update()` method signatures:

| Screen | Signature |
|--------|-----------|
| `FileSelectionModel` | `Update(msg tea.KeyMsg, selections map[string]bool) tea.Cmd` |
| `TemplateSelectionModel` | `Update(msg tea.KeyMsg) (*template.Template, tea.Cmd)` |
| `TaskInputModel` | `Update(msg tea.KeyMsg) (string, tea.Cmd)` |
| `ReviewModel` | `Update(msg tea.KeyMsg) tea.Cmd` |

**Solution:** Standardize all screens to follow `tea.Model` interface:
```go
Update(msg tea.Msg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd)
```

This enables standard Bubble Tea patterns like embedding models.

title: Implement 'c' key handler for clipboard copy in review screen
description:
**File:** `internal/ui/screens/review.go`, lines 80-86

**Problem:** The footer mentions `c: Copy to Clipboard` (line 284) but this shortcut isn't implemented in the `Update` method. The 'c' key is never handled.

**Solution:** Add key handler for 'c' to copy content to clipboard.

title: Add fuzzy match highlighting in file tree
description:
**File:** `internal/ui/screens/file_selection.go`, lines 186-188

**Problem:** The filter input shows a blinking cursor but doesn't highlight matched characters in the tree view.

**Solution:** Highlight matched characters in file names to help users understand what's matching during fuzzy search.

title: Remove direct Viper access from UI layer
description:
**Files:** 
- `internal/ui/wizard.go`, lines 585-588
- `internal/ui/screens/review.go`, lines 67-70

**Problem:** Direct Viper access in UI layer violates clean architecture principles.

**Solution:** Inject configuration via constructor instead of accessing Viper directly in the UI layer.

title: Fix spinner not animating in progress component
Replace time.Sleep with tick-based polling in commands
Add help text for empty template state
description:
**File:** `internal/ui/screens/template_selection.go`, line 168

**Problem:** Users see "No templates found" but get no guidance on how to add templates.

**Solution:** Add help text like:
```go
"No templates found.\n\nRun `shotgun template create` to add templates."
```
